overview: County Durham England 1984 the miners strike has started and the police have started coming up from Bethnal Green starting a class war with the lower classes suffering caught in the middle of the conflict is 11-year old Billy Elliot who after leaving his boxing club for the day stubbles upon a ballet class and finds out that he's naturally talented. He practices with his teacher Mrs Wilkinson for an upcoming audition in Newcastle-upon Tyne the audition is for the royal Ballet school in London.
tagline: Inside every one of us is a special talent waiting to come out. The trick is finding it.
cast: Jamie Bell|Gary Lewis|Julie Walters|Jean Heywood|Jamie Draven
